<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0
         http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>999-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <packaging>maven-plugin</packaging>

    <properties>
        <maven.compiler.source>21</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>21</maven.compiler.target>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <maven.version>3.8.8</maven.version>
        <maven-enforcer-plugin.phase>validate</maven-enforcer-plugin.phase>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <!-- Maven Plugin API -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-plugin-api</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugin-tools</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-plugin-annotations</artifactId>
            <version>3.9.0</version>
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Maven Core for MavenSession -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-core</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Maven Project -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-model</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- JSON output -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
            <version>2.10.1</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Maven Invoker API for batch execution -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.shared</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-invoker</artifactId>
            <version>3.2.0</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Test Dependencies -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugin-testing</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-plugin-testing-harness</artifactId>
            <version>3.3.0</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-compat</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <version>4.13.2</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>21</source>
                    <target>21</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-plugin-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.9.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <goalPrefix>nx</goalPrefix>
                </configuration>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>default-descriptor</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>descriptor</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                    <execution>
                        <id>help-goal</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>helpmojo</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-dependency-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.6.1</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>copy-dependencies</id>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>copy-dependencies</goal>
                        </goals>
                        <configuration>
                            <outputDirectory>${project.build.directory}/dependency</outputDirectory>
                            <overWriteReleases>false</overWriteReleases>
                            <overWriteSnapshots>false</overWriteSnapshots>
                            <overWriteIfNewer>true</overWriteIfNewer>
                        </configuration>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
</project>

            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Maven Core for MavenSession -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-core</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Maven Project -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-model</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- JSON output -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
            <version>2.10.1</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Maven Invoker API for batch execution -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.shared</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-invoker</artifactId>
            <version>3.2.0</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Test Dependencies -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugin-testing</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-plugin-testing-harness</artifactId>
            <version>3.3.0</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-compat</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <!-- JUnit 5 -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit-jupiter</artifactId>
            <version>5.10.1</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Mockito -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-core</artifactId>
            <version>5.8.0</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-junit-jupiter</artifactId>
            <version>5.8.0</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>21</source>
                    <target>21</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-plugin-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.9.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <goalPrefix>nx</goalPrefix>
                </configuration>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>default-descriptor</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>descriptor</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                    <execution>
                        <id>help-goal</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>helpmojo</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-dependency-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.6.1</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>copy-dependencies</id>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>copy-dependencies</goal>
                        </goals>
                        <configuration>
                            <outputDirectory>${project.build.directory}/dependency</outputDirectory>
                            <overWriteReleases>false</overWriteReleases>
                            <overWriteSnapshots>false</overWriteSnapshots>
                            <overWriteIfNewer>true</overWriteIfNewer>
                        </configuration>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
</project>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0
         http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>999-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <packaging>maven-plugin</packaging>

    <properties>
        <maven.compiler.source>21</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>21</maven.compiler.target>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <maven.version>3.8.8</maven.version>
        <maven-enforcer-plugin.phase>validate</maven-enforcer-plugin.phase>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <!-- Maven Plugin API -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-plugin-api</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugin-tools</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-plugin-annotations</artifactId>
            <version>3.9.0</version>
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Maven Core for MavenSession -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-core</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Maven Project -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-model</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- JSON output -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
            <version>2.10.1</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Maven Invoker API for batch execution -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.shared</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-invoker</artifactId>
            <version>3.2.0</version>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Test Dependencies -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugin-testing</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-plugin-testing-harness</artifactId>
            <version>3.3.0</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-compat</artifactId>
            <version>${maven.version}</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <!-- JUnit 5 -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit-jupiter</artifactId>
            <version>5.10.1</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        
        <!-- Mockito -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-core</artifactId>
            <version>5.8.0</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
            <artifactId>mockito-junit-jupiter</artifactId>
            <version>5.8.0</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>21</source>
                    <target>21</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.2.5</version>
                <configuration>
                    <useModulePath>false</useModulePath>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-plugin-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.9.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <goalPrefix>nx</goalPrefix>
                </configuration>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>default-descriptor</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>descriptor</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                    <execution>
                        <id>help-goal</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>helpmojo</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-dependency-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.6.1</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>copy-dependencies</id>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>copy-dependencies</goal>
                        </goals>
                        <configuration>
                            <outputDirectory>${project.build.directory}/dependency</outputDirectory>
                            <overWriteReleases>false</overWriteReleases>
                            <overWriteSnapshots>false</overWriteSnapshots>
                            <overWriteIfNewer>true</overWriteIfNewer>
                        </configuration>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
</project>

# Maven Plugin Introspection Service Analysis

## Overview
Analysis of the MavenPluginIntrospectionService class and related test methods to identify the constructor, methods, and any missing method calls.

## MavenPluginIntrospectionService Constructor

The service has a single constructor that requires 4 parameters:

```java
public MavenPluginIntrospectionService(
    MavenSession session,
    LifecycleExecutor lifecycleExecutor, 
    Log log, 
    boolean verbose
)
```

### Constructor Parameters:
- `MavenSession session` - Current Maven session context
- `LifecycleExecutor lifecycleExecutor` - Maven's lifecycle executor for analyzing execution plans
- `Log log` - Maven plugin logger for debug/info messages
- `boolean verbose` - Flag to enable detailed logging

## Key Methods

### Public Methods:
1. `analyzeGoal(String goal, MavenProject project)` - Main analysis method that returns `GoalIntrospectionResult`

### Private Analysis Methods:
- `findMojoExecution(String goal, MavenProject project)` - Finds MojoExecution for a goal
- `analyzeMojoExecution(MojoExecution, GoalIntrospectionResult)` - Extracts basic execution info
- `analyzeMojoDescriptor(MojoDescriptor, GoalIntrospectionResult)` - Analyzes mojo parameters
- `analyzeParameter(Parameter, GoalIntrospectionResult)` - Analyzes individual parameters
- `analyzePluginConfiguration(MojoExecution, GoalIntrospectionResult)` - Analyzes XML configuration

### Helper Methods:
- `isFileParameter()`, `isOutputParameter()`, `isSourceParameter()`, `isTestParameter()`, `isResourceParameter()`
- `analyzePluginTypePatterns()` - Pattern-based plugin analysis
- `createFallbackResult()` - Creates minimal result when introspection fails

## Inner Classes

### GoalIntrospectionResult
Contains comprehensive information about a goal:
- Basic info: goal name, plugin details, lifecycle phase, execution ID
- Behavior flags: processesSources, testRelated, needsResources
- Parameter analysis: file parameters, input/output patterns, configuration paths
- `toGoalBehavior()` method converts to GoalBehavior for compatibility

### ParameterInfo
Simple container for parameter metadata (name, type, description).

## Test Methods Analysis

### Missing Methods in Test Context

From the test file analysis, these methods are being called but come from Maven's test framework:

1. **`readMavenProject(File pom)`** - From `AbstractMojoTestCase`
   - Reads a Maven project from a POM file
   - Returns `MavenProject` instance

2. **`newMavenSession(MavenProject project)`** - From `AbstractMojoTestCase`
   - Creates a new Maven session for testing
   - Returns `MavenSession` instance

3. **`lookup(Class<T> clazz)`** - From `AbstractMojoTestCase`
   - Looks up components from the test container
   - Used to get `LifecycleExecutor.class`

4. **`getContainer().getLogger()`** - From `AbstractMojoTestCase`
   - Gets the logger from the test container
   - Returns Maven `Log` instance

### Test Structure Pattern

Tests follow this pattern:
```java
// Setup
File pom = getTestFile("src/test/resources/unit/basic-test/pom.xml");
MavenProject project = readMavenProject(pom);
MavenSession session = newMavenSession(project);
LifecycleExecutor lifecycleExecutor = lookup(LifecycleExecutor.class);

// Create service
MavenPluginIntrospectionService service = new MavenPluginIntrospectionService(
    session, lifecycleExecutor, getContainer().getLogger(), true);

// Use service
GoalIntrospectionResult result = service.analyzeGoal("compile", project);
```

## Related Services Integration

### EnhancedDynamicGoalAnalysisService
- Has constructor that creates MavenPluginIntrospectionService internally
- Missing method: `getIntrospectionResult(String goal, MavenProject project)` - Called in tests but not defined

This method should be added to EnhancedDynamicGoalAnalysisService:
```java
public MavenPluginIntrospectionService.GoalIntrospectionResult getIntrospectionResult(String goal, MavenProject project) {
    return introspectionService.analyzeGoal(goal, project);
}
```

## Dependencies

The service requires these Maven dependencies:
- `org.apache.maven:maven-core` (for MavenSession, MavenProject)
- `org.apache.maven:maven-plugin-api` (for Log, MojoExecution, etc.)
- `org.apache.maven:maven-model` (for plugin descriptors)
- `org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-utils` (for Xpp3Dom XML handling)

## Key Features

1. **Dynamic Plugin Analysis** - Uses Maven's introspection APIs instead of hardcoded logic
2. **Parameter Analysis** - Detects file/directory parameters automatically
3. **Configuration Analysis** - Parses plugin XML configuration
4. **Caching** - Results are cached to avoid repeated analysis
5. **Fallback Logic** - Graceful degradation when introspection fails
6. **Pattern Recognition** - Framework-specific patterns (Quarkus, Spring Boot)

## Summary

The MavenPluginIntrospectionService is a comprehensive service that replaces hardcoded plugin logic with dynamic Maven API analysis. All required methods exist except for `getIntrospectionResult()` in EnhancedDynamicGoalAnalysisService. The test framework methods (`readMavenProject`, `getLogger`, etc.) come from Maven's built-in testing utilities.

Based on my analysis, I found the MavenPluginIntrospectionService class and identified its structure, methods, and the missing method issue. Here's a summary:

## MavenPluginIntrospectionService Constructor and Methods

**Constructor:**
```java
public MavenPluginIntrospectionService(
    MavenSession session,
    LifecycleExecutor lifecycleExecutor, 
    Log log, 
    boolean verbose
)
```

**Main Method:**
- `analyzeGoal(String goal, MavenProject project)` - Returns `GoalIntrospectionResult`

## Missing Method Issue

In the test file `MavenPluginIntrospectionServiceTest.java`, there's a call to:
```java
MavenPluginIntrospectionService.GoalIntrospectionResult detailedResult = 
    enhancedService.getIntrospectionResult("compile", project);
```

However, this method `getIntrospectionResult()` doesn't exist in the `EnhancedDynamicGoalAnalysisService` class. It should be added:

```java
public MavenPluginIntrospectionService.GoalIntrospectionResult getIntrospectionResult(String goal, MavenProject project) {
    return introspectionService.analyzeGoal(goal, project);
}
```

## Test Framework Methods

The methods like `readMavenProject()`, `getLogger()`, `newMavenSession()`, and `lookup()` are not missing - they come from Maven's `AbstractMojoTestCase` class which the test extends.

## Key Findings

1. The MavenPluginIntrospectionService is well-structured with comprehensive introspection capabilities
2. It uses Maven's official APIs to analyze plugins dynamically instead of hardcoded logic
3. The only missing method is `getIntrospectionResult()` in EnhancedDynamicGoalAnalysisService
4. The service includes caching, fallback logic, and detailed parameter analysis
5. Inner classes `GoalIntrospectionResult` and `ParameterInfo` provide comprehensive goal analysis data
